body:
Hi,

I am working with new version of Honeybee. I make a very simple zone and wanted to test it. When I run the file, its results are annually, but I want the hourly results. I change the timestep in the into the hourly, monthly and daily, but the results are annually again! I open EnergyPlus file to check the variables, and all of the frequencies of the variables are annual. 

What is the problem of my Honeybee?

Thanks alot.

Regards,

Helia Taheri
topic: My Honeybee always simulates annually and gives me only one value!
